00016 class ORVDataDecoder
00017 {
00018 
00019   public:
00020     ORVDataDecoder() {fDecoderDictionary = NULL;}
00021     virtual ~ORVDataDecoder() {}
00022 
00024     virtual inline bool IsShort(UInt_t* dataRecord) 
00025       { return ( (dataRecord[0] & 0x80000000) == 0x80000000 ); }
00026 
00028     virtual inline bool IsLong(UInt_t* dataRecord) 
00029       { return !IsShort(dataRecord); }
00030 
00032     virtual inline UInt_t DataIdOf(UInt_t* dataRecord) 
00033       { return IsShort(dataRecord) ? dataRecord[0] & 0xfc000000 : 
00034                                      dataRecord[0] & 0xfffc0000; }
00035 
00037     virtual inline UInt_t LengthOf(UInt_t* dataRecord) 
00038       { return IsShort(dataRecord) ? 1 : dataRecord[0] & 0x3ffff; }
00039 
00041     virtual inline UInt_t CrateOf(UInt_t* record)
00042       { return IsShort(record) ? (record[0] & 0x01e00000) >> 21 : 
00043                                  (record[1] & 0x01e00000) >> 21; }
00044 
00046     virtual inline UInt_t CardOf(UInt_t* record)
00047       { return IsShort(record) ? (record[0] & 0x001f0000) >> 16 : 
00048                                  (record[1] & 0x001f0000) >> 16; }
00049 
00051 
00058     virtual void Swap(UInt_t* dataRecord);
00059 
00060     virtual void DumpHex(UInt_t* dataRecord);
00061 
00063     static UInt_t GetIllegalDataId() { return 0x1; } 
00064 
00066 
00086     virtual std::string GetDataObjectPath() = 0;
00087 
00089 
00097     virtual std::string GetDictionaryObjectPath() { return ""; }
00098     virtual void SetDecoderDictionary(const ORDecoderDictionary* aDict) 
00099       { fDecoderDictionary = aDict; }
00100 
00101   protected:
00103 
00153     virtual const ORVDictValue* GetValueFromKey(std::string key, 
00154       UInt_t crate, UInt_t card);
00155     virtual const ORDictValueA* GetArrayFromKey(std::string key, 
00156       UInt_t crate, UInt_t card);
00157 
00158     virtual std::string GetStringValueFromKey(std::string key, 
00159       UInt_t crate, UInt_t card);
00160     virtual Int_t GetIntValueFromKey(std::string key, 
00161       UInt_t crate, UInt_t card);
00162     virtual Double_t GetRealValueFromKey(std::string key, 
00163       UInt_t crate, UInt_t card);
00164     virtual Bool_t GetBoolValueFromKey(std::string key, 
00165       UInt_t crate, UInt_t card);
00166  
00167     virtual std::string GetStringValueFromKeyArray(std::string key, 
00168       UInt_t crate, UInt_t card, size_t index);
00169     virtual Int_t GetIntValueFromKeyArray(std::string key,

00171     virtual Double_t GetRealValueFromKeyArray(std::string key, 
00172       UInt_t crate, UInt_t card, size_t index);
00173     virtual Bool_t GetBoolValueFromKeyArray(std::string key,
